data.title: Harpoon Ventures Raises $125 Million for Early-Stage Startups
data.meta_description: Harpoon Ventures, whose investors include Andreessen Horowitz veteran Peter Levine and former Olympic swimmer Michael Phelps, has raised a $125 million fund to back early-stage startups.
data.text:
Firm targets technology with government and commercial uses

Andreessen’s Peter Levine, swimmer Michael Phelps back firm

Harpoon Ventures, whose investors include Andreessen Horowitz veteran Peter Levine and former Olympic swimmer Michael Phelps , has raised a $125 million fund to back early-stage startups.

The fund — the firm’s fourth — is expected to close Friday, according to Harpoon founder Larsen Jensen . It will be slightly larger than the previous fund, which closed in 2021 at $122.5 million.
